name: Beginner's Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu for Self-Defence
description:
Brazilian Jiu Jitsu is an incredibly fun, empowering, practical form of self defence known worldwide for enabling smaller people to protect themselves against people of any size. This beginner-friendly class will cover basics that apply to real life self-defence.  Come try it and have fun.

** Everyone who joins will get free access to BJJ101 Beginner's Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu video course **
